item.title: Cyclocomputer Garmin Edge 520 - experience
item.description: I bought Garmin Edge 520 couple weeks ago. There are quite a few reviews on internet so this is not intended to be a general review. This is rather few comments on features I didn’t find described elsewhere. Device configuration I was used from Sigma Rox 9.0 that the configuration is done with convenience in a related software. This served also for the configuration backup. Unfortunately most of the setup for Garmin Edge 520 needs to be done manually on the device itself.
